amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force, up to $4,000,000 for the Transportable Transponder Landing System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4777 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4777 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Smith. (consideration: CR S8674-8675; text: CR S8674) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force, up to $4,000,000 for the Transportable Transponder Landing System.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4777 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Smith.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4777 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
